remarks: If the limit of ` F ` at ` B ` is ` C ` and ` G ` is continuous at ` C ` , then the limit of ` G o. F ` at ` B ` is ` G ( C ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2016.)

limccnp $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` C ) e. ( ( G o. F ) limCC B ) ) $.
